Package domain.brick

Class MineBrick

java.lang.Object
domain.PhysicalObject
domain.brick.Brick
domain.brick.MineBrick
All Implemented Interfaces:
domain.DocumentSerializable
public class MineBrick
extends domain.brick.Brick
Extends abstract Brick class. MineBrick is a type of Brick which has a circular shape and does circular movement. Also, it causes to explosion when it is hit by ball and the explosion destroys all the bricks in an area of a specific radius.

    • MineBrick

      public MineBrick​(int posX, int posY, double velocityX, double velocityY, int width, int height)
      Constructor for MineBrick class.
      Parameters:
      posX - : x position of the brick.
      posY - : y position of the brick.
      velocityX - : horizontal velocity of the brick.
      velocityY - : vertical velocity of the brick.
      width - : horizontal diameter of the brick.
      height - : vertical diameter of the brick.

    • move

      public void move()
      Overridden move() method. First, sets horizontal and vertical velocities according to the angle, then updates the angle since it moves in a circular path. After all, calls the move() function of its superclass.
      Overrides:
      move in class domain.brick.Brick

    • getRotationDirection

      public int getRotationDirection()

      Returns:
      int: rotationDirection field.

    • setRotationDirection

      public void setRotationDirection​(int rotationDirection)
      setter for rotationDirection field. Note that, it also calls move() function twice to avoid unexpected bugs.
      Parameters:
      rotationDirection - : new value of rotationDirection to set.
